mapper.select: select o.`order_num` as orderNumber, c.`order_line_num` as orderLineNumber, p.`designer_id` as designerId , p.`color_code` as colorCode, b.`english_name` as brandName , p.`season_code` as seasonCode, s.`size` as size , case when spu.`spu_name` is not null then spu.`spu_name` else p.`name` end as productName, lp.`shipping_fee` as shippingFee, c3.`name` as l3Category, o.`wechat` as buyerName, o.`contact_phone` as buyerContact, lp.`im_price` as salePrice, c.`shipment_code` as ems, c.`id` as ccZhangOrderEmailId from `cczhang_order_email` c inner join `logistics_product` lp on (lp.`order_line_num` = c.`order_line_num` and lp.`enabled` = true) inner join `order_logistics` ol on (ol.`order_logistics_id` = lp.`order_logistics_id` and ol.`enabled` = true) inner join `order` o on (o.`order_id` = ol.`order_id` and o.`enabled` = true) inner join `shop_product_sku` sps on (sps.`shop_product_sku_id` = lp.`shop_product_sku_id` ) inner join `sku` s on (s.`sku_id` = sps.`sku_id` and s.`enabled` = true) inner join `shop_product` sp on (sp.`shop_product_id` = sps.`shop_product_id` ) inner join `product` p on (p.`product_id` = sp.`product_id` and p.`enabled` = true) inner join `category` c3 on (c3.`category_id` = p.`category_id` and c3.`enabled` = true) inner join `category` c2 on (c2.`category_id` = c3.`parent_id` and c2.`enabled` = true) inner join `category` c1 on (c1.`category_id` = c2.`parent_id` and c1.`enabled` = true) left join `spu` spu on (spu.`spu_id` = p.`spu_id` and spu.`enabled` = true) inner join `brand` b on (b.`brand_id` = p.`brand_id` and b.`enabled` = true) where c.`send_email` = 0 and c.`is_deteled` = 0 and c.`action_type` = #{actionType} ;
mapper.delete: update cczhang_order_email set send_email = 1,send_email_time=now() where id = #{ccZhangOrderEmailId}
